Name: Cuban Liberal
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Light white rum mellowed by Italian vermouth and made interesting with bittersweet French Amer Picon liqueur.
History: Adapted from a drink featured in the La Florida (El Floridita) Cocktails book, this is a riff on El Presidente .
Nutrition: One serving of Cuban Liberal contains 151 calories
